s: Learn how to identify unauthorized Amazon Pay charges on your statements, file claims for refunds, and take steps to secure your account against potential fraud or misuse.

t: Identify an Amazon Charge - Amazon Customer Service
s: Sometimes, an order can be split into multiple shipments or sent to different addresses. In these cases, Amazon charges your payment method when each part of the order is shipped. This is why you have separate charges on your statement.

t: How to research an unknown Amazon charge - Amazon Customer Service
s: Check unknown charges such as AMZNMktplace or amzn.co.uk/pmgb via your Amazon transaction history in Your Account > Your Payments > Transactions.

t: Unknown Charges on Prime Video - Amazon Customer Service
s: There are several reasons why you might not recognize a charge.

t: Get Rid of Amazon Unauthorized Purchases - Don't Panic!
s: February 5, 2025 - Having trouble with an unknown Amazon charge? Here's the definitive guide to help you easily resolve issues related to Amazon Unauthorized Purchases.

t: Multiple Charges for the Same Order - Amazon Customer Service
s: Orders may be split into multiple shipments or even multiple orders. Because we charge for items when they're shipped, it may result in multiple charges. However, the total amount charged should add up to the amount displayed when you placed the order.

t: What to do if you receive an Amazon charge that you don't recognize - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you receive unknown charges with descriptors such as amzn mktp ca or amazon channels amazon.ca bc, follow these steps to identify or report unknown charges.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: I keep getting charged 15.08 from Amazon, but I don't have a subscription. How do I fix this? - Quora
s: Answer: Contact amazon. I would also claim fraud on your bank account. If you know you did not subscribe I'd do that immediately

t: Why am I getting charged 3+ times for an item I bought on Amazon that they already charged me for? - Quora
s: Answer: So i recently bought an fathers day gift for my father, its 49.99 but it comes with a 20% coupon which made it $32.61. I have recently been charged 5 times (not counting the actual charge) 3 of them went throught and 2 got declined because i locked my card. And now another 2 is going thro...

t: Authorization Charges on Amazon - Amazon Customer Service
s: Authorizations are not actual charges. When you purchase on Amazon, your bank reserves funds until the transaction processes or the authorization expires.

t: Were you charged for Amazon Prime without your permission? | Consumer Advice
s: January 5, 2024 - screens before you get to check-out, you could wind up signed up for a service without even knowing it. What’s worse, it can be tough to cancel. Read on to learn how to protect yourself from unwanted services and charges.

Yes you will be charged by each marketplace each month. And yes they will take what’s showing as owed. It’s previously been reported that an account cannot be changed once opened - however if you are a brand new seller you may have a chance if you tell them at once.

t: Why Am I Being Charged for Amazon Music? Solved!
s: Amazon Music has official integration with many brands and devices. And they may release some special offers to attract users. For example, you purchased a device that collaborates with Amazon Music. It will give Amazon Music Unlimited free trial as a present for you for a period of time. But if you do not notice it, it will start charging ...

Noticed an Amazon Pay unauthorised charge? Review your orders and file a claim if necessary. Take immediate action by contacting your bank, changing your password, and enabling two-step verification. Notify Amazon Pay buyer support to prevent further misuse.
